text:
Totilas (May 23, 2000 – December 14, 2020), also known from 2006 to 2011 as Moorlands Totilas, and nicknamed "Toto", was a Dutch Warmblood stallion. Totilas was thought to be one of the most outstanding competitive dressage horses in the world. Totilas was retired from competition in August 2015.
Totilas died of colic on December 14, 2020 at the age of 20.
